dcterms:description: CIRCLE contains 10 hours of full-body motion in 9 diverse scenes paired with egocentric information of the environment. The dataset is created by integrating real-world motion capture sequences into a high-quality artist-created virtual environment.
dcterms:title: CIRCLE

dcterms:creator: Yang Zheng
Yanchao Yang
Kaichun Mo
Jiaman Li
Tao Yu
Yebin Liu
C Karen Liu
Leonidas J Guibas
dcterms:description: GIMO consists of body pose sequences, scene scans, and eye gaze information. The dataset is collected using Hololens and IMU-based motion capture suits for motion acquisition, and iPhone 12 for scene scanning.
dcterms:title: GIMO

dcterms:creator: Naureen Mahmood
Nima Ghorbani
Nikolaus F Troje
Gerard Pons-Moll
Michael J Black
dcterms:description: AMASS is an archive of motion capture data that provides a comprehensive collection of human motion data represented as surface shapes.
dcterms:title: AMASS
